name: Chocolate Gravy
description: This might be closer to a thin pudding than traditional gravy, but it's still a decadently sweet and creamy sauce that's excellent smothered over fresh biscuits.
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons butter, sliced into 1 tablespoon pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together sugar, cocoa, and flour in a medium saucepan until completely smooth.

Place saucepan over medium heat and whisking constantly, slowly add milk. Bring to a simmer and cook until gravy is thickened to a consistency a little thinner than pudding, about 3 minutes, whisking frequently.
Stir in butter, vanilla, and salt. Remove from heat and serve immediately.
